description: Sting, along with Auel Neider and Stella Loussier, are the three Extended pilots of the Earth Alliance`s special forces team, called Phantom Pain. Together with his comrades he sneaks into the PLANT colony Armory One, where he steals one of the three new Gundam-type mobile suits, the ZGMF-X24S Chaos.
name: Sting Oakley
